blocks.content: In this milestone, you install the pre-built MySQL dashboards and alert rules that come with the integration. These provide immediate visibility into your MySQL database performance.
In the **Install dashboards and alerts** section, click **Install**.
You should see the following message: `Dashboards and alerts have been installed.`
Click **View Dashboards** to see the integration dashboards.

A folder containing the MySQL dashboards appears:

- **MySQL**: Overview dashboard with key performance metrics
- **MySQL logs**: Log analysis dashboard for troubleshooting
Navigate to **Alerts & IRM > Alerting > Alert rules** to see the installed alerts.
The Alert rules page shows all active alerts. MySQL integration alerts include `MySQLDown`, `MySQLReplicationLag`, `MySQLSlowQueries`, and more.
